name: fastestsmallesttextencoderdecoder
description: The fastest smallest Javascript polyfill for the encode of TextEncoder and decode of TextDecoder for UTF-8 only. Made by AnonyCo with â¤ï¸ from ðŸ•s.

scripts.install-dev: mkdir compiler-latest 2> /dev/null; wget -P ./compiler-latest/ 'https://dl.google.com/closure-compiler/compiler-latest.tar.gz'; unlink ./closure-compiler.jar 2> /dev/null; cd compiler-latest; tar xvzf compiler-latest.tar.gz; bash -c 'for j in closure-compiler-*; do mv -- "$j" "../closure-compiler.jar" 1> /dev/null; done' 1> /dev/null 2> /dev/null; cd ..; rm -rf compiler-latest 2> /dev/null
scripts.build: npm run build-require; npm run build-module
scripts.build-module:
java -jar ./closure-compiler.jar --use_types_for_optimization --source_map_format V3 --js ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.src.module.js --js_output_file ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js  --create_source_map ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js.map --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --output_wrapper '%output%//AnonyCo
//# sourceMappingURL=EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js.map' --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2016; sed -i -e 's/Object.freeze/export default/' './NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js'
scripts.build-es6:
java -jar ./closure_compiler.jar --use_types_for_optimization --source_map_format V3 --js ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.src.module.js --js_output_file ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js  --create_source_map ./NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js.map --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --output_wrapper '%output%//AnonyCo
//# sourceMappingURL=EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js.map'  --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2016; sed -i -e 's/Object.freeze/export default/' './NodeJS/EncoderAndDecoderNodeJS.min.module.js'
